text:
LockState | Senior Software Engineer | Denver, CO | Full-time | Remote

We are set to be the leading smart lock platform. Join us in building the future of access control in the cloud.

- Ruby

- React & React Native

- Ansible

- Terraform

- AWS

- gRPC

Small, close-knit senior dev team consists of Foo (USA), Bar (Brazil), and Baz (Croatia).

This IoT stuff is very fun to work on. And challenging because security.

jobs@lockstate.com
